description:
It`s the day of the Bon festival. Akiko reminisces about how Kyusaku proposed to her on this day. When Nuku Nuku and Ryunosuke bike so fast to school that they travel through time, they witness the proposal themselves, and learn why Kyusaku fights Mishima so passionately.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Toki o Koete! Propose wa Bon`odori!
Nuku Nuku passes time - Proposal at the bon dance
ヌクヌク時をこえて! プロポーズは盆踊り!
